Detailed Description

Desk for leaf manager training.

Storage container for threaded decider training.

Member Data Documentation

◆ leaf_regression_map_p

std::vector<Mat<float> >* forpy::LeafDesk::leaf_regression_map_p

Pointer to a shared vector of a mapping node_id->regression value. Since multiple threads never write to the same node and the vector is guaranteed to be large enough, concurrent writes can be performed.
